page.title: 20TRANSPORT SERVICES
page.content: MOST PEOPLE WORK AND SHOP AWAY FROM THE VILLAGE. THE MEN USUALLY USE CARS. { {BUS SERVICES.} {MONDAY TO FRIDAY.} FIVE BUSES PASS THROUGH THE VILLAGE DURING THE DAY TO CIRENCESTER VIA KEMBLE. ONE EARLY MORNING BUS GOES TO TETBURY AND FOUR GO TO STROUD VIA TETBURY. {SATURDAY.} ONE BUS GOES TO CIRENCESTER AND ONE TO TETBURY. A BUS PASSES ALONG THE A433 TO BRISTOL IN THE MORNING AND RETURNS IN THE AFTERNOON. { {RAIL SERVICES.} REGULAR SERVICES RUN FROM KEMBLE STATION TO LONDON, PADDINGTON AND CHELTENHAM.
